com.jtechdev.util

Class PlatformUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jtechdev.util.PlatformUtils

  • public class PlatformUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for dealing with the platform (e.g. Mac or Windows).
